divs: Sighting DetailsDriving South on 55 heading towards Crown Point. About 1 mile south from rt 30 I noticed a Red Glowing orb heading East ans slightly south. I could be over Hyles College. It was flickering or Pulsating orange and red then it vanished in mid air. It never really looked like a Airplane. It seemed to have the speed of a Helicopter.
Summary: Orb traveled between Schererville and Crown Point. in a slight South East direction. Then Varnished in thin Air.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Crown Point
There were no other sightings in Crown Point on or around July 3rd 2012
